lead_paragraph: A picture on Sunday with an article about the impact of major financial trouble at General Motors on sports marketing amid an already weak economy was published in error. It showed Dale Earnhardt Jr. and his crew competing in a Nascar event — not Dale Earnhardt Inc., a separate racing team that, as the article noted, cited economic conditions in announcing that it planned to merge with Chip Ganassi Racing.
